# localIdentity(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set the local identity TLS uses during the handshake.

## Declaration

```swift
func localIdentity(_ identity: sec_identity_t) -> TLS
```

## Parameters

- **identity**: The local identity to be used during the TLS handshake.
title: localIdentity(_:)
